Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the logic of the game - it controls the methods that make the game restricted or unrestricted and the methods that return the question or answer of the tree This is the class that calls the class that parses the xml file and creates the tree. This class is also responsible for manipulating inputs by the user and write another file.
    Version:
    12/7/2017
    Author:
    Ioanna Deni

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameController(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
      The constructor calls the class that writes the binary tree from the document that it takes as a parameter and sets the root of this tree as the current referenced question

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getNo()
      This method returns always the right child of the binary tree and in the way it is written it is always the next question or answer of the no response of the user
      java.lang.String getQuestion()
      This method returns the data in type string of the current node
      java.lang.String getYes()
      This method returns always the left child of the binary tree that in the way it is written it is always the next question or answer of the yes response of the user
      java.lang.String leafLibrary()
      This method returns all possible leafs of the tree at any instance as strings
      void restart()
      This method takes the current node which is the one referenced to to be the root of the tree which causes the use to replay the possible pahtways of the tree
      java.lang.String updateNo(javax.swing.JPanel panel, org.w3c.dom.Document document)
      This method returns always the right child of the binary tree and in the way it is written it is either the next question or answer of the no response of the user or calls the class for updating the game (xml tree)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
